rev.comment: Revert improper inclusion of "hard rock" in infobox (please read the article--"hard rock" was synonymous with heavy metal for years); revert improper hyphen to proper en-dash
Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/195.195.7.49|195.195.7.49]] to last version by Bardin (using [[WP:HG|Huggle]])
removing dead link to deleted article

/* Antecedents: mid-1960s */further ce--many of the popular originals were Chicago blues, already electric
/* Visual elements */ rmv GWAR, because they are not a "newer band" (they formed in 1985), and let's remove Mshrmhd as well, as the 2 well-known acts get the message across
rv anon, uncommented change; [[WP:UNDO|Undid]] revision 217201487 by [[Special:Contributions/74.47.11.154|74.47.11.154]] ([[User talk:74.47.11.154|talk]])
rv anon, uncommented change; [[WP:UNDO|Undid]] revision 217201415 by [[Special:Contributions/74.47.11.154|74.47.11.154]] ([[User talk:74.47.11.154|talk]])
Fixed the link to sweep picking
revise discussion of Motorhead per previous edit
Removed mention of Motörhead as a NWOBHM band, since they aren't (common misconception)

rv uncommented edits--one eliminating cited info, one adding ridiculously obvious point yet again
rv--poorly written version of philosophical point that applies to ALL artistic media; [[WP:UNDO|Undid]] revision 215885368 by [[Special:Contributions/Zddoodah|Zddoodah]] ([[User talk:Zddoodah|talk]])

rv--genre and subgenre distinctions are blurry and subjective in every artistic medium
rv--guys, please take the grindcore debate to the Talk page and let's try to come to a consensus there (I'm agnostic on the point)--but, please, no cites in the infobox link list

Like I said, While associated with DM, its not really a fusion genre. This is the last time I'm removing it
restore to last version by Duhautpas
Many metal bands are influenced by classical music but it doesn't mean Metal descends from classical
Many regard Cream as more powerful then Grand Funk Railroad
Cream were one of the major bands in the 60s that were very loud
Like I said, While associated with DM, its not really a fusion genre

not a genre so move to scenes
